headline: Marathon Petroleum Beats Energy Sector, Price Target Raised by Wolfe Research
summary: Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) is one of the 10 most undervalued oil stocks to buy according to analysts. On June 11, Wolfe Research maintained its Outperform rating on Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) while increasing its price target to $187 from $186. In keeping with its larger refining competitors, Marathon Petroleum Corporation (NYSE:MPC) has outperformed the Energy Select […]
